title: Make roles more accurate.
body:
For me there are problems with every role and here are my suggestions to fix them (I feel as if some roles have fallen from what they should be doing):

Tank: Meant to be someone with strong defense that can take hits for the team.

Marksman:  Meant to be a glass cannon that is protected by their team that focuses more on damage than anything else.

Support: A player that aides the team most often through: Warding, Kill assisting And Utility.

Fighter: Most commonly melee,  fighters can hold themselves in a duel whether it be with sustain or low cool-down abilities these guys are made to just keep going at it.

Mage:  Quite often equipped with high burst and damaging abilities,  mages are similiar to assassins, they have a lot of burst but  if it's not enough then they can be left wide open.

Assassin: These guys have it out for you, their main specialty is killing you and killing you fast, with high risk high reward kits these guys will either be rewarded or punished severely. 

Now I've gone and explained my general take on all the roles, that's well and good but now I'll get to my point,  my point is secondary roles, these need to be removed, and I'll explain why on every role, if these changes were to take place it would make league a more team based game and reward teamwork even more, and to make it so you **need** to use teamwork to win.

What I mean by this is quite commonly you can have a single person carry  and not have to use teamwork, this would make it so that in order to carry this person would have to better work with their team, what if it's a bad team you ask?  Then it's a bad team, everyone will get them sometimes, it wouldn't be harder to carry, it would just require better team play strategy.


Now the suggestion to remove secondary roles.

Tanks: Remove their damage, make them actual tanks.

Marksman: Remove their self peel, make it so they 100% need their team.

Mages/AP:  Should just be damage dealers of a burst level, not people with high resets that can decimate a team by themselves.

Fighters: These guys are okay except for the ones that can get tanky and still do heaps of damage.

Assassins: The problem is   that  some assassins have high burst yet can still sustain themselves in a fight which takes away from their high risk high reward.

Supports: The problem I see is that a lot of supports are really tanky and have heaps of utility,  and some supports can even hold their own if played in another role due to their secondaries, supports need to be people with high utility that aide their team.


This would  make it so team play is more encouraged and that you need your team, of course league is already a team game this would just make it more so, I don't really want to add a tldr but I will, just make sure you read the whole post if you have an objection:

TL;DR: Take away secondary roles and make roles more dependent on other roles to enforce higher reward in teamfights.
